Absolute garbage game supported by garbage developers who won't respond to trouble tickets until it's addressed in a future update weeks, even months, after the fact. Of course this game is reaching heights as far as its popularity is concerned, and the developers keep adding superfluous bullshit to this game without working on things that need to be fixed that have been in the game for years. Also, I always hear people whine about the killers being bullied by survivors, but the only reason those complaints exist is because they're playing against good survivors, not because survivors are overpowered. Yet, the developers hear those complaints and they use those as an excuse to give killers even more leverage, which is totally unjustifiable. Hell, I'll even play a ton of games as killer with no perks/addons, and every single game I got at least 3 kills due to how easy playing killer is. All of this crap that a killer can tack on to their arsenal takes away from the bare-bones mechanical aspect of the game, and lowers the skill cap so significantly that skill isn't even a factor anymore. The developers keep adding more and more unnecessary shit, which makes the game less and less fun to play. At this point, I've lost all hope for this game, and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. The only way to enjoy this game is to play killer, or play with friends and try to have fun, which seems almost impossible at this stage of the game's development.

Terrible game balance -- if this were a competitive e-sports title, it might be bad enough to actually be legally actionable, that's how bad it is.  Additionally, BHVR display a downright Bethesda-esque level of buggy coding and awful optimization, and every patch fixes one issue at the expense of breaking three other things that hadn't ever before been problems.  Combine all this with a player base that's so toxic it qualifies as an EPA Superfund site, and I'd say give this a hard pass.

DBD es un juego que recomiendo tanto para jugar solo, como es mi caso habitual, como con amigos. Tiene problemas de balanceo de personajes un poco más decantado hacia los killers que los supervivientes, aunque por otra parte, estos se las pueden hacer pasar muy canutas al killer por no decir que lo pueden humillar muy bastamente si le juegan bien. Pero por lo general si te gusta dar o recibir sustos a otros jugadores y no eres de los que les entra el miedo pronto creo que te gustara este juego.

The games community has it's ups and downs but overall the game is a lot of fun, constantly changing and adding it new content. If the end game chat starts to feel toxic, it's an entirely unnecessary component that you have the option to turn off in your setting. So don't let any concerns about "toxic players" in chat be a reason you stay away - the game can be fun so long as you play to have fun, not play to treat it like an esports match.

dead by daylight é um jogo multiplayer de "terror", o jogo é muito mais competitivo do que aterrorizante, basicamente são 4 sobreviventes que só podem contar com janelas, palets e perks para sobreviver a uma perseguição contra o killer, killer sendo apenas um jogador que deve enganchar cada sobrevivente 3 vezes para ganhar a partida. No basico é bem isso, claro que ainda tem o slug por exemplo, quando o killer derruba os 4 sobreviventes no chão e depois engancha um por um, mas contra isso, temos a park "inquebravel" por exemplo, que faz com que um sobrevivente levante mais rapido e sozinho do chão, podendo assim levantar os demais. A gameplay do jogo a principio é bem simples, mas vai se dificultando e aperfeiçoando conforme os usos das perks, que sao obtidas de 3 maneiras diferentes, tem as iniciais que o jogo te da, as de personagens que no inicio são exclusivas de cada personagem mas a medida que vc vai upando eles vc vai liberando para seus outros personagens, e as da loja "santuario dos segredos" que voce pode comprar perks de outros personagens sem ter que upa-los. O jogo anda com bem pouco player ultimamente, conta com uns 30 mil jogadores no mes, oq é bem pouco comparado aos mais de 100 mil que tinha antigamente, mesmo assim acho que é um ótimo jogo para voce pegar em promoçao e se divertir com uns amigos.
